name: 𝔹𝕃𝔸ℂ𝕂𝕊𝕂𝕐-𝕄𝔻
description: WhatsApp Multi-Device Bot using Node.js and Baileys library

SESSION_DATA.description: Full session data for WhatsApp connection (will be provided after first local run)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: WhatsApp number of the bot owner (with country code)

BOT_NUMBER.description: WhatsApp number for pairing code (with country code, no '+' or spaces)
